description: Noah Brooks needs to get a life. All the boy does is play on the goddamn Wii. Dude is like an idiot savant when it comes to Wii Tennis. Logan Lush, on the other hand, has never played the thing in his life.This preexisting fact got Noah thinking one day when Logan was over. Long harboring a jones for Logan's sweet mouth, Noah hatches a plan that is sure to land him the return he's after. So a bet is made over a game of Wii Tennis. One game. Loser sucks the other guys dick.Stick around to see who wins.Enjoy!
title: Loser Sucks!
